name: Dainty in Damask Party Dress - A Modest Goddess Creation
description:
I love it when I can get my customers jaw to drop with one of my designs, but I am beyond thrilled when I can get my own jaw to drop! This dress is that beautiful!

This gorgeous dress is made from 100% high quality cotton and professionally finished with hand stitching, cute buttons and to die for fabric. I will carefully and meticulously recreate this dress with the finest materials and with great attention to detail. This dress is made to last and would make a beautiful heirloom for passing on to future generations. This dress buttons in the back and the fit can be customized using the double face satin tie sash. It is simple, gorgeous, and portrait ready.

The skirt and bodice is fully lined and two sets of buttons are attached to the straps to allow for the best fit and longer wear.

name: Modest Goddess presents - Eden's Apron Style Hankie Dress
description:
The best part of my job is seeing how each custom made design turns out, this dress was designed for baby Eden by her mother Rebekah, and with her permission, I offer her design to you.

This gorgeous dress is made from 100% high quality cotton and professionally finished with hand stitching, cute buttons and to die for fabric. I will carefully and meticulously recreate this dress with the finest materials and with great attention to detail. This dress is made to last and would make a beautiful heirloom for passing on to future generations. This dress buttons in the back and the fit can be customized using the floral print tie sash. It is simple, gorgeous, and portrait ready.

This dress is currently being offered in sizes 6/12 month through size 8. Please allow 2-3 weeks for your dress to be created and shipped.
